name: Squared Cats
description:
Uploaded for "Minijam127"

I don't know if the theme was "cats" or "cats^2" but I went with the latter one and ended up with this idea in about 30 seconds. There were 6 colors given that needed to be in the project in some form so I just decided that those colors are going to be the only ones in the game.

You can see everything that there is currently to see in ~5 mins. I think I will update this a bunch so this will someday be an actual proper game with an ending and stuff.

Controls:

WASD: move

left-click: interact

tab (hold): highlight interactables

F: toggle flashlight

shift (hold): run

Z (hold): zoom
